overview:
Luigi Reggiani was born in Casablanca and grew up in Agadir, Morocco. He has received a MA Equivalent in International Trade at the IPAG Business school, Paris. Between 2000 & 2005, he has worked in leading companies such as Doubleclick and Kelkoo and at end of 2005, Luigi has joined Google France within the Agency team to evangelize French agencies on Google Advertising Solutions.

Between 2008 and 2010 Luigi joined the Google Product team, responsible for coordination between local sales teams & engineers to launch new products & features in EMEA.

In 2011, Luigi became Business Development Manager, responsible for North Africa.
